My burning heart

My burning heart
Heavy with worry
My friends pasted
Troubled and with unpleasant memories
I feel nothing but joy and happiness
At the sound of her voice
My mending heart
Mended for a time.
My heart lifted high at the thought of seeing her once again
Hoping my voice helps her feel the same as I
Then without warning come silence
Not knowing the fate of the other
Has my caring heart said something wrong or frightened her
Do I just need more patients?
Does she need more time?
Wishing my presents can help her feel many things
It would bring me joy
And help me feel hole again
To bring her feelings of
Joy and laughter
Warmth and security
To become a true friend
To know that our time together warms my heart
To the building of a lasting friendship
That will stand all tests ahead of us
I sit by the phone
Waiting for my heart to be lifted high once again
I pray she will call me back

My current state of mind...(Almost)

Broken Heart
by Crystal Holtz and edited my myself.

I will never forget the days we once had
The days when you were everything to me
My mind used to tell me we'd be together forever
But now I realize that was all a big dream
The feelings I have for you will never go
I wish I could take back that one regretful day
The day when I let you slide from my arms
Never did I think of the astonishing pain of regrets
That I am having to live through
The thought of you in someone else's arms
Makes my heart shatter into a million pieces
I sometimes wonder if you still think of me
Or if to you, I'm just becoming a face in the crowd
But for now, I'll sit here silently
Remembering all the memories we once shared
Hoping that one day I will feel love again
And put back the pieces of my broken heart

To my best friend "JO"

A life leason...

Everything happens for a reason. Nothing happens by chance or by means of good or bad luck. Illness, injury, love, lost moments of true greatness and sheer stupidity all occur to test the limits of your soul. Without these small tests, if they be events, illnesses or relationships, life would be like a smoothly paved, straight, flat road to nowhere.
If someone hurts you, betrays you , or breaks you heart, forgive them. For they have helped you learn about trust and the importance of being cautious to who you open your heart to.

If someone loves you, love them back unconditionally, not only because they love you, but because they are teaching you to love and opening your heart and eyes to things you would have never seen or felt without them.

Make every day count. Appreciate every moment and take from it everything that you possibly can, for you may never be able to experience it again.

Talk to people you have never talked to before, and actually listen. Hold your head up because you have every right to. Tell yourself you are a great individual and believe in yourself, for if you don't believe in yourself, no one else will believe in you either.

You can make of your life anything you wish. Create your own life and then go out and live it.

Taking a Stand

Boxed into a corner
Foreboding message taken serious
Secluded from a friendship because of compassion
The thought of loosing one whose heart knows no limits
Tears at the soul like a whirlwind
Angel of kindness follow your heart
Let me go if you must
Cherished memories will never be lost
Our lives forever entwined together
Life the soil surrounding the roots of a rose
One cannot live without the other
Yet apart the rose is still beautiful

©Nick Rausse

Looking In

The window is distorted to look through
What is seen hurt one to see
A friend in need of comfort but out of reach
If only the one they love could see
The heart of a person that loves without being loved back
Deserving of affection and trust
Having been faithful and honest
Yet stands accused of doing what hasn’t even been thought of
Freedom to associate chosen people revoked
We look in hoping they can feel the love that surrounds them.

© Nick Rausse

Renovations

The renovations on the home are coming along ok. The kids where up for spring break and are excited about the new place. I'm hoping this is going to work out good. Still having a bit of trouble coming to terms with being a single Dad. But I'll live. Hope everyone has a good weekend.

Going to the dance

Today my daughter phoned and asked me if I could come with her to a father, daughter Princess dance on Friday the 20th. There is no way I'm going to miss that... So Thursday I'm leaving the Gibsons, BC the go to a dance with my Kira. Then I'm going to spend the weekend with my kids as well. Things have not been going well for me in the emotions area... be they say there is light at the end of the tunnel. I miss some of my friends but the ones that are true friends I know they always will be. The rest I feel sorry for as in order to know what a true friend is... one must first know what a friend is. So for those people that have never had a true friend I feel for you. It can be a very lonely world for you. For those of you who have true friend... I hope the best for you and hope you never loss them. My friend know that even when I'm far away from them that they are all dear to me and always will be. My best friends are my kids by far... and I'll never let them down. Have a good week all. I am back to work tomorrow for a few days till I go to see the kids. I miss them immensely.

My Father/Daughter Princess Dance

It was one of the best night I have ever had. My daughter was so beautiful I cried. I hape you all enjoy the pictures of my daughters dance as much as I enjoyed being there.
